intro: Aneilema tenuissimum, commonly known as the slender aneilema, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate leaves and clusters of white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests. Aneilema tenuissimum is often found in the understory of forests, where it thrives in partial to full shade.
